name: ticket-tracker-2021-refactored
description: A full-stack ticket tracker application that allows users to create tickets to track their bugs, issues, or tasks to complete. This is a new, improved and refactored version of my Ticket Tracker application on my personal portfolio. Implements ES6+ modern coding practices, React Hooks, Async/Await promises, Redux-like state management (Context API), MongoDB for persistent data storage, and NodeJS/Express backend.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: Shaker Kattoula
